Translations.Text: Geukheun boh hana nyang jeuet lon peugah Hana lon teupeue dum buet ureueng nyan
Keunira gopnyan sideh bak Allah Meunyo tateupeue Po lon nyang kira
Ureueng nyan teuma han jeuet lon keubah Han roe lon use ureueng meuiman
Peuingat mantong dilon lon peugah Lon nyoe peuingat sagai nyang nyata
Jikheun treuk boh ka bek le tapeugah Meunyo han taiem hai Noh digata Meurajam gata jinoe le bagah
Kheun Noh Tuhanku pakri kaom lon Han jipateh lon jikheun beurakah
Neubuka jalan keu lon nibak jih Neubri lon bak jih jinoe le beu glah Ngon dum rakan lon ureueng meuiman
Teuma Noh lheueh nyan Kamoe peuleupah Ngon rakan gopnyan geu-ek lam kapai Nyang peunoh beukai dum ngon blah bicah
Awak nyang tinggai laen nibak nyan Kamoe peukaram lam laot luah
Atra nyan bandum sit jeuet keu tanda Allah Taʻala Kuasa leupah Teuma le that jih han jimeuiman Dijih bandum nyan hana phaedah
Keubit Po gata Maha Peurkasa Lom pih Po gata Maha Peumurah
Jikheun lom le ‘Ad sulet dum Rasul Han jitem kaboi peue nyang Hud peugah
Chedara jih Hud geukheun bak jih nyan Pakon gata han takwa keu Allah
Lon nyoe bit Rasul jeuet tapeucaya
Teuma takwa gata keu Allah Tataʻat keu lon nyang Rasul gata
Hana bak gata lon lakee upah Bak Po dum alam upah lon ka na
Pakon tabina geudong dum meugah Pat-pat tanoh cot tapeudong geudong Teumpat tameuʻen meumewah-mewah
Tapeugot kota dum ban saboh nyan Takira dum nyan han le takeubah f Tapike keukaiteuh sinan sabe Sang han le mateteuh meunan ulah
‘Oh tapeuleumah droeteuh kuasa Angkara murka lalem sileupah Leupah that keujam buetteuh di gata
Teuma takwa jinoe keu Allah Tataʻat keu lon nyang Rasul gata
Nikmat keu gata Neubri le leupah d Tateupeue nikmat le that keu gata Nyankeuh tatakwa mantong keu Allah
Padum na Neubri binatang teurnak Neubri ngon aneukteuh le sileupah
Padum na keubon ngon ie mon mata
Teuma keu gata lon takot salah Lon takot azeueb Neubri keu gata Bak uroe gata teurimong balah Uroe kiamat haro hara that
Jiseuot leugat peue roe tapeugah Tabri nasehat keunoe keu kamoe À Saban bak kamoe ngon han tapeugah Saban ngon hana tabri nasehat
